about_the_game:
Sakura, Eileen, Bianca, and Akane, the high school girls, found themselves reluctantly transferring to an abandoned High School due to renovations at their old school. As their bus approached the new school, they were shocked to see an eerie, decrepit building surrounded by graveyard and shadowed by an ominous forest. The atmosphere was thick with an unsettling silence, broken only by the creaking of the horror school's doors, even the teachers didn't say anything about it. Despite they're scared of ghost, the girls must do their activities in this creepy school, unaware of the dark mystery and supernatural encounters that awaited them within its spooky haunted halls.

If you love playing simulation games that offer a blend of adventures, horror, and fighting, Scary School Simulator 3 is good for you. Walk into a high detailed anime stories, solve horror mysteries, and prank your friends!
